Name: HMS Verbena
Motto: Virtute bene donata: 'Well endowed with Valour'
Badge: On a Field White a Verbena Flower proper with halo Gold.
Propulsion:
single shaft
2 × fire tube Scotch boilers
1 × double acting triple-expansion reciprocating steam engine
2,750 ihp (2,050 kW)
Range: 3,500 nautical miles (6,482 km) at 12 knots (22.2 km/h)
processing systems:
1 × SW1C or 2C radar
1 × Type 123A or Type 127DV sonar
Armament:
1 × 4 inch BL Mk.IX single gun
2 × Vickers .50 machine guns (twin)
2 × .303 inch Lewis machine gun (twin)
2 × Mk.II depth charge throwers
2 × Depth charge rails with 40 depth charges
Minesweeping gear
